entry.title: 3/25 - de/composition: a national juried exhibition
entry.content:
Main Street Arts
📍 Clifton Springs, NY, United States
🎨 All Visual Arts
📅 03/25/2019 deadline
💰 $30.00 fee
➡ Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

A national juried exhibition with a focus on things decomposing, being in a state of decay, deconstructed, or paired down. Both the conceptual side as well as technical/ compositional side of the theme will be encouraged. Open to artists working in all media. This exhibition is open to all U.S. residents at least 18 years of age.

Exhibition Juror: Margot Muto, head of exhibitions at Memorial Art Gallery, Rochester, NY

Submission Deadline: Monday, March 25, 2019
Exhibition Dates: May 25–June 28, 2019
Opening Reception: Saturday, June 1, 4–7pm


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

To submit, go to: http://www.mainstreetartsgallery.com

Main Street Arts
20 West Main St.
Clifton Springs, NY 14432
mstreetarts@gmail.com
315-462-0210
